Uses of Interface
prng.generator.SeedSource

  • Packages that use SeedSource 
    Package Description
    prng
    Secure Random Number Generation in Java.
    prng.collector
    Tools for collecting entropy from the JVM's runtime environment.
    prng.generator
    This package provides implementations of pseudo-random number generators.
    prng.seeds
    This package provides storage for seed entropy.

    • Uses of SeedSource in prng

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SeedSource SystemRandom.SOURCE
      Source for getting entropy from the system
      static SeedSource Fortuna.SOURCE
      Derive entropy from Fortuna

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) abstract SeedSource SecureRandomBuilder.Source.getSource()
      Get the source implementation.

    • Uses of SeedSource in prng.collector

      Classes in prng.collector that implement SeedSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  InstantEntropy.Result
      A seed source that holds the result of entropy generation and releases it as it is requested.
      Fields in prng.collector declared as SeedSource 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SeedSource InstantEntropy.SOURCE
      An "instant" entropy source

    • Uses of SeedSource in prng.seeds

      Classes in prng.seeds that implement SeedSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PermutingSeedSource
      Generate fake seeds by generating every permutation of the number 0 to 255.
      class  ZeroSeedSource
      All requested seeds consist wholly of zeros.
      Fields in prng.seeds declared as SeedSource 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SeedSource ZeroSeedSource.SOURCE
      A singleton source as all seeds are identical.
